name: Runeborne
description:
Thanks for considering our game!

Runeborne is a fantasy shooter where you have to cast spells as well as loot weapons to survive.
Q to bring up spell select. Don't be afraid to cast multiple spells at the same time!
WASD to move
E near chests to pick up weapons
Right click to drop weapons
Left click to attack

Made in 3 days my a 3 man team.
